fields.description:
Replication Steps:

Step 1: Log into http://admin-k6.thinkcentral.com/ePCAdmin/login
Use username - Jjohnson@mps-edu.org
Step 2: Select NATL Journeys 2017
Step 3: Select grade 3
Step 4: Click Teacher eBook
Step 5: Click Unit 6
*Notice Unit 6 is accessible and a part of the book and teacher guide

Step 8: click book 2
Step 9: Click Contents on the bar on the right hand side

fields.description:
Step 1:  Impersonate teacher username: CHRISTOPHER_STUDEBAKER@FCASD.EDU using the my.hrw.com admin tool
Step 2:  Click within Search for Resources and search for "Level Up Tutorial: Capitalization"
Step 3:  Click on "Level Up Tutorial: Capitalization HMH Collections, Grade 7" to open it
Step 4:  Click on Start
Step 5:  Click on the Practict tab
Step 6:  Click the next arrow twice to get to Question 3

Expected result:  For the answer marked correct to have correct capitalization
Actual Results:  Instead of "Life is a Highway" it is "Life Is a Highway".  The "is" should not be capitalized

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
1. Log into http://admin-k6.thinkcentral.com/ePCAdmin/loginAsAnotherUser.do?method=viewLoginAsAnotherUser&selectedTopMenu=loginAsAnotherUser
U:  dawnwheeler@hvrsd.org
2. Select ":Go math" from the resource dropdown
3. Select Grade 2 from the resource center
4. Click the right arrow to scroll in the resource carousel
5. Locate and click "Math on the Spot Video Tutorial GK-6"
6. Select Garde 2
7. Click "Chapter 6 3-Digit Addition and Subtraction"
8. Click "Lesson 6.7 3-Digit Subtraction: Regrouping Tens"

Expected result: Video uses same numbers from Question 8 found on page 429 of the student eBook

Actual result: Certain videos use differing numbers from the ones given in the book. Please view additional setps below for videos that do match book question 

1. Log into http://admin-k6.thinkcentral.com/ePCAdmin/loginAsAnotherUser.do?method=viewLoginAsAnotherUser&selectedTopMenu=loginAsAnotherUser
U:  dawnwheeler@hvrsd.org
2. Select ":Go math" from the resource dropdown
3. Select Grade 2 from the resource center
4. Click the right arrow to scroll in the resource carousel
5. Locate and click "Math on the Spot Video Tutorial GK-6"
6. Select Garde 2
7. Click "Chapter 6 3-Digit Addition and Subtraction"
8. Click "Lesson 6.6 3-Digit Subtraction"

Expected result: Video uses same numbers from Question 5 found on page 423 of the student eBook

Actual Result: Video problems match book

Customer concern:

"My question is for the developers of these videos; Why do some of the videos use the same numbers that are in the student book and why do some of the videos use different numbers.  Is there a list of videos in which the problems use the same numbers? Please refer to Grade 2 video 6.6. The video teaches the problem using the same numbers.  
Can someone please vet these videos? There are a few videos that don't correlate to the book."
fields.summary: Math on the Spot videos do not have exact correlating questions in the books
fields.customfield_30000171: Kevin Gomez (kevin.gomez@hmhco.com) on behalf of Dawn Wheeler (dawnwheeler@hvrsd.org) of Bear tavern Elementary School
fields.customfield_30005095: Go Math! Math On The Spot Videos Online 6 Year Digital Grades K-6
